DOC.brief_summary: The clinical protocol clinical test device : 1 . Objective test : To verify function efficiency device . 2 . Test method procedure : Comparison Test . 3 . DUT ( Device Under Test ) : Transtek Glass Body Fat Analyzer , Model : GBF-733-W1 , GBF-1012 , BF-1039 , BF-1041-A , GBF-950-D. 4 . Comparison device : Transtek Glass Body Analyzer , GBF-950 ( Predicate Device ) . 5 . Study endpoint : Transtek device predicate device substantial equivalence . 6 . Statistical methodology use : Description statistical method . 7 . Result : Efficiencies Transtek device predicate device level .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trail Transtek Glass Body Fat Analyzer
DOC.detailed_description: Hospital Information The data collect Zhongshan City People 's Hospital Clinical Investigator Team Zhongshan City People 's Hospital , No.2 Sunwen Dong Road , Zhongshan , Guangdong 528403 , P. R. China . Investigator : Dr. Stephen Feng , Leader ; Fan Futao , Nurse A ; Wu Yanting , Nurse B . Contact Dr. James Zhu Tel : +86 760 88823818 Used Equipments DUT ( Device Under Test ) : Transtek Glass Body Fat Analyzer , Model : GBF-733-W1 , GBF-1012 , BF-1039 , BF-1041-A , GBF-950-D. Reference Device : Transtek Glass Body Analyzer , GBF-950 ( Predicate Device ) . Test Protocol 1 . Test Purpose : The aim clinical test collect weight , body fat , total body water , bone mass , muscle mass read value measure DUT reference device . Note : GBF-733-W1 BF-1039 bone mass function . So collect weight , body fat , total body water , muscle mass data . 2 . Target Subject : The subject database shall contain least 25 male 25 female subject 18 year old . Patient 's population analysis bellow . 3 . Test procedures 1 ) Record name , age , gender value subject . 2 ) Let subject seat calmly two minute test , dry foot . 3 ) Use device measure weight , body fat , total body water , bone mass , muscle mass ; record reading value . 4 ) For subject , repeat 3 ) get 3 pair measurement . 5 ) Repeat step 1 ) 4 ) every device ( DUT : GBF-733-W1 , GBF-1012 , BF-1039 , BF-1041-A , GBF-950-D ; reference device : GBF-950 ) . 6 ) Repeat step 1 ) 5 ) subject . 5 . Note : 1 . No motion speaking allow measurement . 2 . All DUT use algorithm , number electrode contact patient body location ( foot ) , operate frequency . 3 . Test environment : Temperature : 22±1℃ ; Relative humidity : 40~50 % .
